title: Lamamra receives Arab League Deputy Secretary-General
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Ramtane Lamamra received Wednesday the Assistant Secretary General of the Arab League, Hossam Zaki, as part of the coordination of efforts with the Algerian authorities which are completing the preparations for the Arab Summit scheduled for 1-2 November in Algiers.

FM Lamamra chaired, in the presence of delegations from both parties, a meeting on all organizational aspects and measures taken by the Algerian authorities to host the Arab delegations in the best conditions.
Lamamra welcomed the support provided by the Secretariat of the Arab League to Algeria throughout the preparations for the 31stÂ Council of the Arab League at the Summit.
For his part, Ambassador Hossam Zaki expressed the recognition of the Secretariat of the Arab League to all Algerian institutions for the efforts, means and facilities provided.

The Assistant Secretary General of the Arab League highlighted the interest of the Algerian authorities in the smallest details relating to the organization and logistics to ensure the success of this important event, welcoming the initiative of Algeria to make the 31st Summit a "zero paper" event for the first time in the history of meetings of the Arab League.
